short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to scan and collect data from Alexa transcripts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension developed to scan and collect data from the Amazon Alexa voice history page (https://www.amazon.ca/alexa-privacy/apd/rvh).
